actions.text: Amendment SA 826 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 193.

Amendment SA 826 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration:  CR S6914, S6918, S6919, S6920; text:  CR S6914) To require the Department of Defense to fully comply with the Competition in Contracting Act for any contract awarded for reconstruction activities in Iraq.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 826 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 193.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 826 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 193.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 826 proposed by Senator Warner.

purpose: To require the Department of Defense to fully comply with the Competition in Contracting Act for any contract awarded for reconstruction activities in Iraq.
